alert.note: Alert for Bartholomew; Decatur; Shelby (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 3:06AM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Shelby, Rush, Decatur and northeastern Bartholomew Counties through 400 AM EDT... At 306 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles southeast of Greenfield to 10 miles west of Greensburg. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Greensburg and Rushville. This includes Interstate 74 between mile markers 115 and 144. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
